regex.name: busca
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Inserte su enlace', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: id2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests mozhdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:55.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/55.0', 'Referer': 'https://www.elitegol.fun/'} return '$doregex[busca]'

regex.name: comecristal
regex.expres: #$pyFunction from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests mozhdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:55.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/55.0', 'Referer': 'https://www.elitegol.fun/'} url = '$doregex[id2]' html = requests.get(url, headers=mozhdr, verify=False).text edata = re.findall('javascript.*?(eval\(function\(p,a,c,k,e,d.*)', html)[0] epage = jsunpack.unpack(edata).replace('\\', '') fin = re.findall('file:"(h.*?)"', epage)[0] return fin

regex.name: id3
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0
